author: Margherita Stancati
title: Family Is Italys Great Strength. Coronavirus Made It Deadly...
description: Family Is Italys Great Strength. Coronavirus Made It Deadly... (Third column, 15th story, link ) Related stories: Over 13,000 Americans seek help to return to U.S. as virus spreads... Bodies on ice rink as Spain sees record infections, deaths... Netanyahu pr…
content:
ROMEThe first call came on March 11. Thats when Roberto Biglioli says he found out that his 81-year-old mother, Giuseppina, had passed away after battling the new coronavirus.
The second call came six days later, says Mr. Biglioli, a medical worker from near… [+184 chars]
